scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:js: terser assets/js/app.js assets/js/section-animations.js assets/js/simple-slide-animation.js assets/js/projects-manager.js -o assets/js/bundle.min.js -c -m
scripts.webp: for f in assets/images/**/*.{png,jpg}; do cwebp -q 80 "$f" -o "${f%.*}.webp"; done
